headline: Verisk Names Saurabh Khemka President of Underwriting Solutions
summary: Doug Caccese steps into strategic advisor role before leaving Verisk in January 2026 Saurabh Khemka President of Underwriting Solutions JERSEY CITY, N.J., Sept. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading strategic data analytics and technology partner to the global insurance industry, today announced that Saurabh Khemka has been named president of Underwriting Solutions, effective immediately. “Saurabh has been a great partner to our underwriting clients and has repeatedly use

headline: Verisk Introduces New AI Tools to Streamline the Property Claims Experience
summary: XactAI brings new automated capabilities to Verisk’s Xactware, a leading software for claims professionalsJERSEY CITY, N.J., Sept. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading data analytics and technology provider to the global insurance industry, today announced the launch of XactAI: a suite of capabilities powered by artificial intelligence that are purpose-built to enhance efficiency, consistency, and speed in claims handling. headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock to Research Further and 2 We Find Risky
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.

raw.headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock to Research Further and 2 We Find Risky
